attributes.action: we need a cycle lane put next to the A386 Roborough to Yelverton stretch!
attributes.background:
The road is national speed limit, many bike users use this road, rain or sunshine, because it is hard to overtake them on many occasions it causes congestion and cars/lorry having to slam on! 
It would be safer if they had there own cycle path, this road is used by all road users.

rejection.details:
This is a matter for Devon County Council, who are responsible for local roads and cycle paths in the Yelverton area. 

You can find out more about starting a petition to Devon County Council here: http://freepetition.co.uk/devoncc/Default.aspx

You could also contact local councillors about this. You can use this page to find out who the local councillors are and how to contact them: 

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
